lenstype: PENTAX KAF2 Bayonet Stainless Steel Mount
autofocus: Yes, Contrast Detect, Phase Detect, Multi-Area, Center, Tracking, Single, Continuous, Face Detection, Live View
whitebalancing: Custom White Balance (3), White Balance Presets (9)
imageformat: JPEG ( Good, Better, Best Quality ), JPG (EXIF 2.3), RAW (DNG), DCF 2.0 Compliant, DPOF, PIM III
otherfocusfeatures: Focal Length Multiplier (1.5x), No. of Focus Points (11), Focus Point Adjustment: Auto 11 Point, Auto 5 Point, User-selectable (Expanded Area AF), Center, AF Assist: Via Dedicated LED AF Assist Lamp, Focus Peaking
dustreduction: Yes, Integrated Shake / Dust Reduction Sensor Movement System
operatingsystem: Windows XP (SP3, 32-bit), Windows Vista (32-bit, 64-bit), Windows 7 (32-bit, 64-bit), Windows 8, (32-bit, 64-bit), Mac OS X 10.5, Mac OS X 10.6, Mac OS X 10.7, Mac OS X 10.8
flashmodes: Auto, On, Off, Red-eye, Slow Sync, Slow Sync+Redeye, Trailing Curtain Sync, Wireless
display: 3.0 inch TFT LCD monitor with brightness/color adjustment and AR coating
